name: tapaidhnaomh
text: That is a common dream.

text: Actually this is the most common dream.

text: Is perhaps most basic dream.

name: weretrout
text: A comment left by weretrout was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Pumpinpedal, Vondicus, Appers, kestral)

name: sargasm
text: MAN that guy is creepy looking.  What is going on with his face?

name: epicurus
text: He appears to be the lines of Alfred Hitchcock's face that he would walk up to at the start of the episodes?

name: sargasm
text: YES!  Brilliant.  That just makes this dream that much weirder.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: Gah! You beat me to it! But yes, I agree.

name: soticoto
text:
[IMGS OFF]


Alfred Hitchcock my arse. That guy is Pob!

name: andyfaewatford
text: Oh Pob, to think you were once so controversial. How televisual standards have slipped...

name: bpmead
text: [IMGS OFF]

name: atticusonline
text: Heh, he lost.

name: 1000hz
text: T, don't take off your mouth man that is all kinds of rude.

name: clembot
text: it seems like T is much more fit in his dream than he is usually drawn

name: atom
text: Teodor must dream in Mexican Magical Realism.

name: jonmw
text: He looks like some blowjob from the Banana Republic

name: fancyrat
text: Teodor wishes he was taller. I wish I was shorter (6'5").

name: spicyponyhead
text: Dude, work it. Guys who are 6'5" make girls who are taller than average (5'8" and above) feel all short and girlylike, on those occasional instances where we like to feel that way.

name: duperando
text: AMEN! I am 5'11 and that is totally a thing for me.

name: carbonation
text: I think one of the best notes hit is the alteration of the dreamer's name to one that people can easily pronounce and type on message boards.

name: centipede_damascus
text: They'll let you marry anybody in Hawaii! Anybody!

name: kledermans
text: Anybody?  Anything, man.  I think a guy married a horse one time.  And somebody else might have married a bush?

name: spicyponyhead
text: Practice animal husbandry!

name: tripleg
text: Or animal wivery, if that's Your Thing.

name: honesttom
text: This is disturbingly similar to a dream I had a couple of nights ago. Hm.

name: hendetta
text: Wade has some fun little lips today!

name: billylk
text: This is an absolute classic

name: henrythecad
text: Let this be a long and prosperous series of strips.

name: jackparsons
text: Ohhhhh, those are candy wax lips!

name: jyuu
text:
AAAAAAAAAAAH.

...That was my literal, out loud reaction to this strip. Still, I love it, possibly because of that reaction.

name: gsurge
text: THIS. IS. THE. BEST. STRIP.

name: aaron_haynes
text: This one freaks me right the fuck out.

name: lawbot
text: FACT

name: spinynorman
text: I am with you 100% on this one.

name: cathaoir
text: Word.

name: stormagnet
text: Seconded. Went straight from "Eeee! Puppy tray!" to ".......!!!!!" to NIGHTMARES.

name: rowboat
text: That is dog shit.

name: mattylite
text: Yes.

name: earendil
text: THE... THE PERFECT THING TO DO EVER!

name: earendil
text: wait why the hell is his name wade hanson in the dream instead of Teodor?  At first i thought that the executive was wade hanson but Ray is clearly talking to Teodor when he says that...

name: chrissketch
text: T is dreaming that his name is Wade Hanson. And that he has his dream job and is in great shape.

name: chrissketch
text: Basically the name represents an ideal that Teodor wishes he could embody.

name: morypcaina
text:
But people still think he's gay.

What a strange anxiety.

name: c_dizzle
text: I am somewhere between scared and scarred.  But there's no way to make a hybrid of those words without making one the other. DAMNIT!

name: mercuri0us
text: scararred

name: vreeeee
text: yeaaauuugh

name: fosters
text: Everyone keeps making "omg that was the best onomatopoeia" posts. I submit that "sluck!" is the grossest. Makes my skin crawl every time I see it.

name: eca
text: T�odor should stop watching Guinness World Records right before going to bed.

name: heccibiggs
text: Screw that. I got to the part where the guy first comes on screen and the presenter's saying "You certainly can't tell by looking at him..." and then realised, shit, I don't want to see this. I can totally live without it. So, thanks, eca, but no thanks.

name: sonic_yoot
text: what do they dream of

name: sonic_yoot
text: argh that was supposed to be written in the "search strip dialogue" box..

name: tekende
text: Wait, why would you type it in the search box if you're already on the right strip...?

name: faits
text: maybe he was wondering if there were other strips in this same vein like if it was a series of sorts

name: charchar
text: I have this one recurring nightmare where my face freezes up.  It starts as a tingling numbness around my lips and suddenly my face is all contorted and frozen and I can't find a mirror but I know I looks like I had such as a stroke or unfortunate neuropathy.  This has been going on since I was eight.

name: unsentletter
text: AAAAGH!

name: direhaggis
text: Oh hell of balls that is a Cartilage Head moment. Suddenly the dream version of Teodor becomes the top of a bowling pin with lip stick and a chin.

name: pogo
text: So surreal!  A hidden girlie mouth!  Yuck!

name: i_love_kate
text: Even 59 year-olds can be disturbed by their first sexual experience.

name: fineoakstructure
text: This is the funniest thing I've read in assetbar in ages.

text: EEEEEEEAUGH!

name: carlyle
text: Did I miss something?

text: OH DANG I CAUGHT UP TO MYSELF

text: NOW YOU'VE PASSED YOURSELF! YOU'RE IN 1ST PLACE, TODD!

text: This is super, super, super bizarre.
